words.translation: Say|It has been revealed|to me|that|listened|a group|of|the jinn|and they said|Indeed we|heard|a Quran|amazing

translations.1: Qul oohiya ilaiya annna hustama'a nafarum minal jinni faqaalooo innaa sami'naa quraanan ajaba
translations.2: Qul oohiya ilayya annahu istamaAAa nafarun mina aljinni faqaloo inna samiAAna quranan AAajaban

words.translation: It guides|to|the right way|so we believe|in it|and never|we will associate|with our Lord|anyone

translations.1: Yahdeee ilar rushdi fa-aamannaa bihee Wa-lan nushrika bi-rabbinaaa 'ahada
translations.2: Yahdee ila alrrushdi faamanna bihi walan nushrika birabbina ahadan

words.translation: And that He|Exalted is|(the) Majesty|(of) our Lord|not|He has taken|a wife|and not|a son

translations.1: Wa-annahoo Ta'aalaa jaddu Rabbinaa maat takhaza saahibatanw Wa-laa walada
translations.2: Waannahu taAAala jaddu rabbina ma ittakhatha sahibatan wala waladan

words.translation: And that he|used|(to) speak|the foolish among us|against|Allah|an excessive transgression

translations.1: Wa-annahoo kaana yaqoolu safeehunaa 'al allahi shatata
translations.2: Waannahu kana yaqoolu safeehuna AAala Allahi shatatan

words.translation: And that we|thought|that|never|will say|the men|and the jinn|against|Allah|any lie

translations.1: Wa-annaa zanannaaa al lan taqoolal insu wal-jinnu 'al allahi kaziba
translations.2: Waanna thananna an lan taqoola alinsu waaljinnu AAala Allahi kathiban

words.translation: And that|(there) were|men|among|mankind|who sought refuge|in (the) men|from|the jinn|so they increased them|(in) burden

translations.1: Wa-annahoo kaana rijaalun minal insi ya'oozoona bi-rijaalin minal jinni fa-zaadoohum rahaqa
translations.2: Waannahu kana rijalun mina alinsi yaAAoothoona birijalin mina aljinni fazadoohum rahaqan

words.translation: And that they|thought|as|you thought|that|never|will raise|Allah|anyone

translations.1: Wa-annahum zannoo kamaa zanantum al lany yab'asal laahu 'ahada
translations.2: Waannahum thannoo kama thanantum an lan yabAAatha Allahu ahadan

words.translation: And that we|sought to touch|the heaven|but we found it|filled (with)|guards|severe|and flaming fires

translations.1: Wa-annaa lamasnas samaaa'a fa-wajadnaahaa muli'at harasan shadeedanw Wa-shuhuba
translations.2: Waanna lamasna alssamaa fawajadnaha muliat harasan shadeedan washuhuban

words.translation: And that we|used (to)|sit|there in|positions|for hearing|but (he) who|listens|now|will find|for him|a flaming fire|waiting

translations.1: Wa-annaa kunnaa naq'udu minhaa maqaa'ida lis'sam'i famany yastami'il 'aana yajid lahoo shihaabar rasada
translations.2: Waanna kunna naqAAudu minha maqaAAida lilssamAAi faman yastamiAAi alana yajid lahu shihaban rasadan

words.translation: And that we|not|we know|whether evil|is intended|for (those) who|(are) in|the earth|or|intends|for them|their Lord|a right path

translations.1: Wa-annaa laa nadreee asharrun ureeda biman fil ardi 'am 'araada bihim rabbuhum rashada
translations.2: Waanna la nadree asharrun oreeda biman fee alardi am arada bihim rabbuhum rashadan

words.translation: And that|among us|(are) the righteous|and among us|(are) other than|that|We|(are on) ways|different

translations.1: Wa-annaa minnas saalihoona Wa-minnaa doona zaalika kunnaa taraaa'iqa qidada
translations.2: Waanna minna alssalihoona waminna doona thalika kunna taraiqa qidadan

words.translation: And that we|[we] have become certain|that|never|we will cause failure|(to) Allah|in|the earth|and never|we can escape Him|(by) flight

translations.1: Wa-annaa zanan-naaa al lan nu'jizal laaha fil ardi Wa-lan nu'jizahoo haraba
translations.2: Wanna thananna an lan nuAAjiza Allaha fee alardi walan nuAAjizahu haraban

words.translation: And that|when|we heard|the Guidance|we believed|in it|And whoever|believes|in his Lord|then not|he will fear|any loss|and not|any burden

translations.1: Wa-annaa lammaa sami'nal hudaaa aamannaa bihee famany yu'min bi-rabbihee falaa yakhaafu bakhsanw Wa-laa rahaqa
translations.2: Waanna lamma samiAAna alhuda amanna bihi faman yumin birabbihi fala yakhafu bakhsan wala rahaqan

words.translation: And that we|among us|(are) Muslims|and among us|(are) unjust|And whoever|submits|then those|have sought|(the) right path

translations.1: Wa-annaa minnal muslimoona Wa-minnal qaasitoona faman aslama fa-ulaaa'ika taharraw rashada
translations.2: Waanna minna almuslimoona waminna alqasitoona faman aslama faolaika taharraw rashadan

words.translation: And as for|the unjust|they will be|for Hell|firewood

translations.1: Wa-ammal qaasitoona fa-kaanoo li-jahannama hataba
translations.2: Waama alqasitoona fakanoo lijahannama hataban

words.translation: And if|they had remained|on|the Way|surely We (would) have given them to drink|water|(in) abundance

translations.1: Wa-alla-wis taqaamoo 'alat tareeqati la-asqaynaahum maa'an ghadaqa
translations.2: Waallawi istaqamoo AAala alttareeqati laasqaynahum maan ghadaqan

words.translation: That We might test them|therein|And whoever|turns away|from|the Remembrance|(of) his Lord|He will make him enter|a punishment|severe

translations.1: Linaftinahum feeh; Wa-many yu'rid 'an zikri rabbihee yasluk-hu 'azaaban sa'ada
translations.2: Linaftinahum feehi waman yuAArid AAan thikri rabbihi yaslukhu AAathaban saAAadan

words.translation: And that|the masajid|(are) for Allah|so (do) not|call|with|Allah|anyone

translations.1: Wa-annal masaajida lil-laahi falaa tad'oo ma'al laahi 'ahada
translations.2: Waanna almasajida lillahi fala tadAAoo maAAa Allahi ahadan

words.translation: And that|when|stood up|(the) slave|(of) Allah|calling (upon) Him|they almost|became|around him|a compacted mass

translations.1: Wa-annahoo lammaa qaama 'abdul laahi yad'oohu kaadoo yakoonoona 'alaihi libada
translations.2: Waannahu lamma qama AAabdu Allahi yadAAoohu kadoo yakoonoona AAalayhi libadan

words.translation: Say|Only|I call upon|my Lord|and not|I associate|with Him|anyone

translations.1: Qul innamaaa ad'oo rabbee Wa-laaa ushriku biheee 'ahada
translations.2: Qul innama adAAoo rabbee wala oshriku bihi ahadan

words.translation: Say|Indeed I|(do) not|possess|for you|any harm|and not|right path

translations.1: Qul innee laaa amliku lakum darranw Wa-laa rashada
translations.2: Qul innee la amliku lakum darran wala rashadan

words.translation: Say|Indeed I|never|can protect me|from|Allah|anyone|and never|can I find|from|besides Him|any refuge

translations.1: Qul innee lany yujeeranee minal laahi 'ahadunw, Wa-lan ajida min doonihee multahada
translations.2: Qul innee lan yujeeranee mina Allahi ahadun walan ajida min doonihi multahadan

words.translation: But|(the) notification|from|Allah|and His Messages|And whoever|disobeys|Allah|and His Messenger|then indeed|for him|(is the) Fire|(of) Hell|(they will) abide|therein|forever

translations.1: Illaa balaagham minal laahi Wa-risaalaatih; Wa-many ya'sil laaha Wa-rasoolahoo fa-inna lahoo naara jahannama khaalideena feehaaa 'abada
translations.2: Illa balaghan mina Allahi warisalatihi waman yaAAsi Allaha warasoolahu fainna lahu nara jahannama khalideena feeha abadan

words.translation: Until|when|they see|what|they are promised|then they will know|who|(is) weaker|(in) helpers|and fewer|(in) number

translations.1: Hattaaa izaa ra-aw maa yoo'adoona fasaya'lamoona man ad'afu naasiranw Wa-aqallu 'adada
translations.2: Hatta itha raaw ma yooAAadoona fasayaAAlamoona man adAAafu nasiran waaqallu AAadadan

words.translation: Say|Not|I know|whether is near|what|you are promised|or (whether)|will appoint|for it|my Lord|a (distant) term

translations.1: Qul in adreee a-qareebum maa too'adoona am yaj'alu lahoo rabbeee 'amada
translations.2: Qul in adree aqareebun ma tooAAadoona am yajAAalu lahu rabbee amadan

words.translation: (The) All-Knower|(of) the unseen|so not|He reveals|from|His unseen|(to) anyone

translations.1: Aalimul ghaibi falaa yuzhiru alaa ghaibiheee 'ahada
translations.2: AAalimu alghaybi fala yuthhiru AAala ghaybihi ahadan

words.translation: Except|whom|He has approved|of|a Messenger|and indeed, He|makes to march|from|before|him|and from|behind him|a guard

translations.1: Illaa manir tadaa mir rasoolin fa-innahoo yasluku min baini yadaihi Wa-min khalfihee rasada
translations.2: Illa mani irtada min rasoolin fainnahu yasluku min bayni yadayhi wamin khalfihi rasadan

words.translation: That He may make evident|that|indeed|they have conveyed|(the) Messages|(of) their Lord;|and He has encompassed|what|(is) with them|and He takes account|(of) all|things|(in) number

translations.1: Liya'lama an qad ablaghoo risaalaati rabbihim Wa-ahaata bi-maa ladaihim Wa-ahsaa kulla shai'in 'adada
translations.2: LiyaAAlama an qad ablaghoo risalati rabbihim waahata bima ladayhim waahsa kulla shayin AAadadan
